title: POLY ROAD MARKINGS AND SIGNS
description: Polygonal road markings and road signs are ideal for creating a cozy atmosphere in your game
longDescription:
The asset includes everything shown in the last two screenshots. The demo scene is not included in the asset.


road markings and signs


road signs

pillar (x4), traffic light (x4), temporary barriers, side barriers, disabled sign, danger sign, height limit, width limit, attention to aircraft, city name (x2), populated area sign (x2), bus sign, pedestrian zone, detour sign (x2), cow warning, deer warning, intersection, bump warning, railway warning, strong wind sign, road narrowing sign (x2), elevation gain, attention sign, tunnel sign, children sign, temporary works, gravel flying sign, bad road sign, landslide warning, square traffic sign (x6), parking sign, pedestrian crossing sign, main road, secondary road, railway warning (x3), crossed out, rest area, gas station, no entry, speed limit, no turn, no U-turn, dead end, stop sign, direction sign (x2), temporary sign, cars only, trucks only, stop, only buses, paid service, direction sign, speed limit, round traffic sign (x6), roundabout, bicycle lane, no stopping, no parking


road markings

bump, different road markings, dividing strips, dotted lines, turns, dotted lines, solid stripes, parking markings, parking zone, fork, signs, no parking zone
technicalDetails:
Collision: Yes


The total number of polygons in the project is 5147.


Textures used 2 images 1024x1024, what about materials of different sizes with road markings. Number of materials 38

Static Meshes: 104

LODs: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


This product supports Lumen for Unreal Engine 5.0+
